survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Indoor Air Quality Products Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, awareness, and purchasing behaviors regarding indoor air quality products, such as air purifiers, humidifiers, and smart air quality monitors.

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about the indoor air quality in your home?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: How concerned are you about the indoor air quality in your home?

questions.question_text: Which of the following indoor air quality products do you currently own? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question. Include 'None of the above' as an option to capture non-owners.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: Which of the following indoor air quality products do you currently own? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when purchasing an indoor air quality product? (Rank top 3, where 1 is most important)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any product in Q2 other than 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question format. Limit to top 3 choices for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Ranking grid (drag-and-drop or numerical input). Skip logic if Q2 = 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when purchasing an indoor air quality product? (Rank top 3, where 1 is most important)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any product in Q2 other than 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current air quality product(s)?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any product in Q2 other than 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Likert scale. Include 'N/A' if needed, but avoid overlap with Q2 logic.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Skip logic if Q2 = 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current air quality product(s)?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any product in Q2 other than 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from purchasing indoor air quality products?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Multi-select with 'Other' open-field option. Helps identify market gaps.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with optional open-text for 'Other'. Skip logic if Q2 â‰  'None of the above'.

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future indoor air quality products?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Use for product innovation ideas.
